genes.content:
`@claude-flow/guidance` turns `CLAUDE.md` into a runtime governance system with enforcement gates, cryptographic proofs, and feedback loops. Agents that normally drift after 30 minutes can now operate for days â€” rules are enforced mechanically at every step, not remembered by the model.

**7-phase pipeline:** Compile â†’ Retrieve â†’ Enforce â†’ Trust â†’ Prove â†’ Defend â†’ Evolve

| Capability | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| **Compile** | Parses `CLAUDE.md` into typed policy bundles (constitution + task-scoped shards) |
| **Retrieve** | Intent-classified shard retrieval with semantic similarity and risk filters |
| **Enforce** | 4 gates the model cannot bypass (destructive ops, tool allowlist, diff size, secrets) |
| **Trust** | Per-agent trust accumulation with privilege tiers and co
